headline: Thoma Bravo Is Said to Be in Talks to Buy Software Firm Dayforce
summary: Shares of Dayforce rose as much as 28% on Monday for their biggest intraday gain in more than seven years.  Representatives for Thoma Bravo and Dayforce didn’t immediately respond to requests for comment.

raw.headline: Thoma Bravo Is Said to Be in Talks to Buy Software Firm Dayforce
raw.summary: Shares of Dayforce rose as much as 28% on Monday for their biggest intraday gain in more than seven years.  Representatives for Thoma Bravo and Dayforce didn’t immediately respond to requests for comment.

headline: Dayforce Stock Jumps On Report Of Private Equity Suitor
summary: Dayforce stock jumped early Monday amid a report private equity firm Thoma Bravo is in talks to acquire the software company.

raw.headline: Dayforce Stock Jumps On Report Of Private Equity Suitor
raw.summary: Dayforce stock jumped early Monday amid a report private equity firm Thoma Bravo is in talks to acquire the software company.
